comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
I bet this was originally part of a panorama view all around.

I read somewhere that the trees (see note) have been there since First Fleet days and are still there.  Does anyone know?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hmm not sure re the trees, but its something we will keep in mind... The National Archives UK have some panorama-style images taken from Government House, a little earlier perhaps (c1870), looking south:
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
